Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
BagListener, CoinsListener, InhibitedListener, IslandListener, MotherPositionListener, NoEntryListener, PlayedCardListener, ProfessorsListener, QueueListener, SpecialListener, SpecialStudentsListener, StudentsListener, TowersListener, Serializable
public class VirtualView extends Object implements TowersListener, ProfessorsListener, SpecialListener, PlayedCardListener, MotherPositionListener, IslandListener, CoinsListener, StudentsListener, InhibitedListener, BagListener, NoEntryListener, SpecialStudentsListener, QueueListener, Serializable
Virtual View class listen to changes in model classes through specific listener interfaces. It writes and reads file saveGame.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    Constructor
    Description
    VirtualView(int numberOfPlayers, boolean expertMode, ControllerServer server, Restore controller, String fileName)
    Create VirtualView with its inner class which represent a photograph of the game board in an instant of play.

    • VirtualView

      public VirtualView(int numberOfPlayers, boolean expertMode, ControllerServer server, Restore controller, String fileName)
      Create VirtualView with its inner class which represent a photograph of the game board in an instant of play.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - in this game;
      expertMode - game mode;
      server - server reference;
      controller - controller reference;
      fileName - saveGame file path;

  • Method Details

    • saveVirtualView

      public void saveVirtualView(boolean expertMode)
      Save all virtualView's inner class which represent a certain game configuration.
      Parameters:
      expertMode - if is true, save also specialList;

    • clearFile

      public void clearFile()
      Clear saveGame file.

    • restoreVirtualView

      public void restoreVirtualView()
      Restore empty SchoolBoard on virtualView adding player of last saved game with their nickname and character.

    • restoreGame

      public void restoreGame(boolean expertMode)
      Read from file info about last saved game.
      Parameters:
      expertMode - indicates if we have to read also info about specials;

      Returns:

      public ArrayList<String> getAlreadyChosenCharacters()
      Returns:

    • notifyStudentsChange

      public void notifyStudentsChange(int place, int componentRef, int color, int newStudentsValue)
      Notify a change of students value somewhere in the model. It also sends new value to the server.
      Specified by:
      notifyStudentsChange in interface StudentsListener
      Parameters:
      place - place == 0 -> school entrance, place == 1 -> school table, place == 2 -> island, place == 3 -> cloud;
      componentRef - reference of the component in the respective list;
      color - color reference;
      newStudentsValue - new value to replace with the older in the corresponding list;

    • notifyProfessors

      Parameters:

      color - color reference;

      Parameters:

      towersNumber - new towers number;
